name: DeepTech Industries
description:
DeepTech Industries is a huge Tech Company, selling almost every device. A few weeks ago they invented their new charging plug "THUNDER" and started implementig it instead of µ-USB. You got annoyed and are now trying to destroy their main server!

Oh! What is running on the server? - I don't know! It's THEIR server! Just get rid of it ... with missiles

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Navigate and explode your way deeper and deeper into the DeepTech Industry building.
